allow: Bash(cmd /c "set PYO3_PYTHON=C:\Python312\python.exe & cargo build -p xdl-interpreter --features python")

Bash(for img in examples_images/03_plotting_basics_xdl_plot.png examples_images/04_trigonometry_xdl_plot.png examples_images/06_sine_cosine_plot_xdl_plot.png examples_images/math_demo_xdl_plot.png examples_images/math2_xdl_plot.png examples_images/sample_script_xdl_plot.png examples_images/05_bezier_surface_xdl_surface.png examples_images/mandelbrot_demo_xdl_surface.png examples_images/test_plot_surface_xdl_surface.png examples_images/test_contour_xdl_contour.png examples_images/plot3d_demo_xdl_contour.png examples_images/plot3d_demo_xdl_surface.png examples_images/plot3d_demo_xdl_shade_surf.png examples_images/plot3d_demo_xdl_plot3d.png examples_images/plot_demo_xdl_plot.png examples_images/plot_working_demo_xdl_plot.png examples_images/simple_plot_test_xdl_plot.png)

Bash(for img in examples_images/colormap_demo.png examples_images/elevation_map.png examples_images/hillshade_demo.png examples_images/vector_field.png examples_images/fluid_instability.png examples_images/rayleigh_taylor_t0.png examples_images/xdl_plot.png examples_images/xdl_contour.png examples_images/xdl_surface.png examples_images/xdl_plot3d.png examples_images/xdl_shade_surf.png)
Bash(do echo "=== Running $test ===" cargo run --bin xdl -- "$test")
